constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 169 (Tuesday, September 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. ESHOO:
H.R. 5397.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H5506]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: National Civilian Medals Improvement Act
